baseInfo.title: Create Your Account
baseInfo.subTitle: Start your digital asset journey
baseInfo.phoneDescription: Phone number must be in the format +1234567890
baseInfo.passwordDescription: Minimum 8 characters with upper, lower case and numbers

wallet.title: Connect Your Wallet
wallet.subTitle: Choose your preferred wallet to continue

verification.title: Choose Your Identity Type
verification.subTitle: Select whether you are an individual or institutional investor
verification.notice: Different verification requirements apply to individual and institutional investors.Please select the appropriate type to proceed with the verification process.

personal.title: Personal Identity Verification
personal.subTitle: Please upload your personal identity documents for KYC verification
personal.upload_subTitle: Front and back sides required, JPG/PNG/PDF up to 5MB
personal.proof_subTitle: Must be issued within last 3 months
personal.facial_subTitle: Clear facial photo in good lighting
personal.notice: All submitted documents must be authentic and unmodified. Please ensure images are clear and complete. The verification process typically takes 1-2 business days. Your personal information is protected with bank-level encryption.

business.title: Business Verification
business.subTitle: Please upload your business documents for KYB verification
business.financial_documents_subTitle: Financial records for the last 6 months
business.notice: Business verification typically takes 3-5 business days. All documents must be officially issued and valid.Additional documents may be required based on your business type and jurisdiction.Your business information is protected with enterprise-level security.

banner.title: Tokenize Real Estate Investment
banner.subTitle: Global property investment made accessible through blockchain technology. Start investing in premium real estate with minimal capital.

route.ownership_content: Invest in premium real estate with as little as $100. Own a piece of high-value properties worldwide.
route.compliance_content: Fully regulated platform with robust KYC/AML procedures. Your investments are secure and compliant.
route.investment_content: Trade your property tokens 24/7 on our secondary market. Unprecedented liquidity for real estate.

works.step1_content: Sign up and complete KYC verification to start investing
works.step2_content: Browse and select from our curated property offerings
works.step3_content: Buy property tokens with your preferred payment method
works.step4_content: Receive regular rental income and capital appreciation

ready.title: Ready to Start Investing?
ready.content: Join our community of property investors and start your journey towards financial freedom.

properties.title: US Real Estate Assets
properties.subTitle: Premium New York real estate investment opportunities through blockchain technology
properties.search: Search by New York location, property type

payment.please_verify: To ensure the security of OTC transactions, you must meet the following requirements and complete the necessary verification process:
payment.please_verify_1: Your account must be fully verified with a valid government-issued ID or passport.

banner.title: Redefining the Future of Real Estate Investment
banner.subTitle: RealToken is committed to making real estate investment simpler, more transparent, and more inclusive through blockchain technology.

help.mission_content: Our mission is to create a more equitable and sustainable future for all by leveraging blockchain technology to transform real estate investment into a more transparent, accessible, and inclusive process.
help.list_li1: Participate in global premium real estate investment with low barriers
help.list_li2: Enjoy fully transparent property management and profit distribution
help.list_li3: Tede asscts feabhy at any timc
help.list_li4: Receive professional investment advice and support
help.title_2020: Company founded, raised $5M in seed funding
help.title_2021: Completed first property tokenization project, reached 1,000+ users
help.title_2022: Obtained FSA license in Japan, expanded to Asian markets
help.title_2023: AUM exceeded $400M, user base grew to 12,000+
help.join_team_subTitle: We're looking for passionate talents to join our team and help revolutionize real estate investment together.
